sardiya_desc: Sardiya adds to Chrome to correct imperialistic terms to the original terms of the Palestinian state and strives to revive the memory of our ancestors and preserve our historical names.
watch_video: Watch Video to know how to use the extension
choose_browser: Choose your favorite browser to download Sardiya Extension
card3_title: Reviving Names as an Act of Resistance
card3_desc: Preserving and reviving original names restores the connection to the land and strengthens belonging, even in the face of challenges and constraints.
card2_desc: Language carries our collective memory and identity, and place names connect us to our history and experiences, adding depth and meaning to our connection with the land.
card1_desc: Preserving original names and reviving them restores the connection to the land and strengthens belonging, even in the face of challenges and constraints.
contact_us_desc: Have questions or want to support our mission? Send us an email We welcome your inquiries and support!
developer_section: Contribute your programming skills! We welcome contributions from developers of all levels. Visit our link to our Contribution Guidelines page to get started.
name_min_length: Name must be at least 3 characters
name_invalid_format: Name must contain only alphabets and numbers
message_invalid_format: Message must contain only alphabets and numbers
form_submission_success: Your message has been sent successfully!
form_submission_failed: Failed to send your message! Please try again.
